path: To Be Organized/30 Rock Global Infrastructure/7N Sony CCU Fiber Monitoring.docx
text: 7N Sony CCU Fiber Monitoring Here is all the info below for the new CCU fiber monitors on the router.   Little wacky workflow, but we have VMs on the ACI net dialed into the Sony VLAN, which is displaying a Sony Webpage that has all the CCU levels and info on it. The NCOMPUTE Thin Clients are wired into Scorpions and have an RDP session into the VMs displaying the Sony Webpages. We did some CSS editing on the Sony Webpages to make it scale properly for the PIPs.      Router SRC:  CR 8H PC MSU (CCU 1-12 for SNL)  3S 3VL1 MSU (CCU 65-80 for MSNBC)  3S 3VL2 MSU (CCU 12-16 for General Network)  3S 3VL3 MSU (Future)     8H Thing Client Screen Scrapper- 100.103.237.199            Password- admin  8H MSU VM- 100.103.233.188  User- 8H.msu  Password- Vprodedit!     3S 1 Thing Client Screen Scrapper- 100.103.237.52  Password- admin  3S 1 MSU VM- 100.103.233.186  User- 3S.msu  Password- Vprodedit!     3S 2 Thing Client Screen Scrapper- 100.103.237.50  Password- admin  3S 2 MSU VM- 100.103.233.187  User- 3S.msu  Password- Vprodedit!     Trevor Bascomb | NBCUniversal  Broadcast Engineering Project Manager | Advanced Projects Engineering  30 Rockefeller Plaza - 14th Floor – 1437W-1 - New York, NY 10112  Desk: 212-413-5859 – Cell: 646-634-3642  Trevor.Bascomb@NBCUni.com
